book.author: J.K. Rowling
book.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

review.text: A great addition to the series

book.description: In this fourth installment of the beloved Harry Potter series, Harry is unexpectedly selected as a participant in a triwizard tournament.

book.author: Steve Jobs
book.title: Steve Jobs

review.text: A must-read for any tech enthusiast

book.description: A biography of the man behind Apple Computers, covering his early life, career, and impact on the world of technology.
